name: The Creature Cowl in Citron
description:
I call this one the Creature Cowl because it is monstrous! It’s a super chunky, super bulky circle scarf tall enough to pull over your head like a hood, wide enough to fit snugly over your shoulders, and thick enough that you will need no other outer wear. Let me tell you, this is the ultimate warmer. And it’s not itchy in the slightest. 

Made with 80% acrylic, 20% wool. This item is ready for shipment! Please allow 5-10 days for your cowl to arrive. Thanks for stopping by!

name: The Fisherman Scarf in Wood
description:
This cozy scarf measures 8 feet long, making it easy to wrap around a few times. It's simple, yet the vertical ribbed pattern makes it unique. The yarn is a warm, natural brown perfect for fall and winter. 

This item is made with 100% wool, but isn't too scratchy.

The Fisherman Scarf in Wood is anxious to be shipped. Mailing will take 5-10 days. Thanks for shopping!

name: The Pelican Warmer in Spice
description:
Extra slouchy!
I adore the color. This is my favorite. The thick, chunky stitch makes it warm and cozy, and it’s not scratchy. It is just wide enough to sit just over the shoulders. 

Made with 80% acrylic, 20% wool. This item is ready to be shipped! Mailing will take 5-10 days. 
Thank you!

name: The Pelican Warmer in Wheat
description:
This is one of my favorite items. It's made with a specially thick and chunky stitch. This is not itchy. And this color is beautiful. 

Made with 80% acrylic, 20% wool. All of our items are handmade to order. Please allow 2-3 weeks for your item to be made and shipped. Thanks!

name: The Tidbit Crocheted Necklace in Sherbet
description:
This is our newest accessory, a crocheted necklace! It's a good excuse to wear crocheted items in any season and any setting. We call this color sherbet because it has pastel pinks, yellows, and greens. 

This product is made from 100% cotton. 

The Tidbit Necklace in Sherbet is ready to be shipped!
